control.name: ceHideOddRows
control.description: This check editor controls the visibility of odd rows within the view. If checked, the odd rows are hidden.

control.name: ceHideEvenRows
control.description: This check editor controls the visibility of even rows within the view. If checked, the even rows are hidden.

control.name: ceRegion
control.windowcaption: Hide Rows if the Region Value is NULL
control.description: If checked, those rows whose value in the Region column is DBNull are hidden.

control.name: gridControl1
control.description: The view's CustomRowFilter event is handled to implement custom row filtering.
